content.prompt: Dr. Patel is conducting a study to test whether a hair-growth shampoo she is developing helps people have higher self-esteem. She instructs fifty participants to use the hair-growth shampoo once daily for a month and another fifty to use a regular shampoo once a day for a month. Dr. Patel measures the participantsâ€™ self-esteem at the beginning and the end of the thirty days. Which of the following is the dependent variable?

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
